  pdf_document:
    includes:
      in_header: header.tex
---
```{r, echo = TRUE}
numfunction = function(.data, x){
  require(dplyr)
  require(knitr)
    x = enquo(x)
    .data |>
     summarize(
      Min = min(!!x, na.rm = T),
      Mean = mean(!!x, na.rm = T),
      Median = median(!!x, na.rm = T),
      Max = max(!!x, na.rm = T),
      NAs = sum(is.na(!!x))
    ) |>
      kable(digits = 1L)   
}    
```
